Package Control

Class StaffListControl

java.lang.Object
Control.StaffListControl
public class StaffListControl extends Object
This class contains the functions used to control the list of staffs.

    • editStaff

      public static void editStaff​(int staffID)
      Add or remove staffs from the restaurant.
      The user will not be able to remove himself.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staffID of the staff calling this function.

    • addStaff

      private static void addStaff()
      Adds a staff into the list of staffs.

      Removes a staff from the list of staffs.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staff ID of the staff to remove.

    • getStaff

      public static Staff getStaff​(int staffID)
      Returns the Staff object of the specified staff ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staff ID of the staff.
      Returns:
      the Staff object, null if staff ID is invalid.

    • checkStaff

      private static boolean checkStaff​(String name)
      Checks if name is in the list of staff.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the staff to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if name is in the list, false otherwise.

    • checkStaff

      private static boolean checkStaff​(int staffID)
      Checks if the staffI D is in the list of staffs.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staff ID to check.
      Returns:
      true if staff ID is in the list, false otherwise.

    • checkRole

      public static boolean checkRole​(int staffID, int role)
      Checks if the staff corresponds to the role.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staff ID to check.
      role - the role to check.
      Returns:
      true if the staff has input role, false otherwise.

    • saveStaffList

      public static void saveStaffList()
      Saves the list of staff.
